Package org.apparatus_templi.web.handler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutHandler
    Handles requests for "/about.html".
    FullXmlHandler
    Handle request for a driver's full page XML.
    GetSysStatusHandler
    Handles requests for system level information.
    IndexHandler
    Handles requests for "/index.html".
    InfoHandler
    Handles request to "/info.html"
    JsHandler
    Handler to return a virtual javascript document containing variables that will change during runtime.
    LogHandler  
    ResourceHandler
    Handler to return the contents of any arbitrary file within the web resources folder.
    RestartModuleHandler
    Handles request to restart service modules.
    RunningDriversHandler
    Handle requests for a list of running drivers.
    SendCommandHandler
    A handler to send commands from the web frontend to a driver.
    SettingsHandler
    Handler to process requests for "/settings.html".
    SettingsXmlHandler
    Handles requests for "/about.html".
    UpdatePasswordHandler
    A handler to write a username/password pair to the database.
    UpdateSettingsHandler
    A handler to accept new preference values from POST data, then write that data back to the configuration file specified.
    WidgetXmlHandler
    Handle request for a driver's widget XML.
